alert.note: Alert for Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:26PM MDT until July 20 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Finley Heights Housing, or 16 miles south of Sisseton, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wilmot around 835 PM CDT. Corona around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Twin Brooks and Milbank. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
